## R Markdown

```{r}
convert_pounds_to_grams <- function(grams)
{grams <- 453.6 * pounds
return(grams)}
```

```{r}
pounds = 3.75
convert_pounds_to_grams()
```

```{r}
get_mass_from_length_theropoda <- function(mass)
{mass <- a * length ^ b
return(mass)}
```

```{r}
a = 214.44
b = 1.46
length <- 26
get_mass_from_length_theropoda()
```
